articles.author: Annie Linskey, Samantha Schmidt, Ana Vanessa Herrero
articles.title: White House reaches out to Venezuela, a longtime foe, amid Russia crisis - The Washington Post
articles.description: Venezuela has long been one of America's most bitter adversaries. But amid the crisis with Russia and soaring gas prices, the Biden administration is reaching out to the Latin American country.
articles.content: The potential thaw arrives as the White House sent a delegation to Venezuela over the weekend to discuss energy sanctions imposed by the United States several years ago and to address the fate of Ame… [+10085 chars]

articles.title: Nintendo Confirms Pokémon Scarlet And Violet Will Be Open World - Kotaku Australia
articles.description: A tweet from Nintendo of America has confirmed that the newest addition to the Pokémon franchise will be open world.
articles.content:
Open world for Pokémon Scarlet & Violet? Confirmed.
The announcement of the newest mainline Pokémon titles has fans screaming, crying, throwing up, and gnawing at their nearest drywall. Easy to … [+2069 chars]
